about_the_game:
Louis is a young man filled with endless optimism who works as a cleaner for the cleaning company Pure Fox.
Almost dealing with the dirt and dust in the house, he receives an alarming message from his friend and rushes to his rescue without a second thought. The friend sends signals for help from the Garbage City - a huge landfill on the outskirts, fenced by a high impregnable fence.



In the process of searching for his friend, Louis discovers for himself more and more the weirdness of this place. It finds out that there is its own unique animal world, established society - there are workers, idlers, services, entertainment, power and even the nascent cult of some very powerful being.
But beware the secret evil does not slumber.

Game Features

  • New and unique world - Garbage City.


  • Mechanics tied to an unusual weapon - a vacuum cleaner.


  • Fight the alived enemies who were thrown into the trash.
  • Not all the garbage wants to eat you. There are those who will tell and immerse you in the history and the lore of this city.
  • Depending on how the player played the game and related to the world around him, he will receive one of three finals.
